attributes.title: Horrible it tacked all of my information and sold it to russia
attributes.review: Now i constantly have russian people and scams calling me and emailing me for money and my information i never had a problem before as this is the first app i downloaded on my first phone

attributes.title: This app turned
attributes.review: This app radiates copious amounts of racist, homophobic, transphobic, and misogynistic energy. Terrible app. I would know, I know all about apps, more than any app doctor or professional. Why? Because I am terrifically smart. There are other apps much better, and very bigger than this one.

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: This app is supporting Donald trump the person that wants to keep out the Mexicans to “Make America Great Again” America was already great when we had Obama. He is racist and this app is supporting that he is part of the reason all the riots and police killing because he’s not stopping them. DONT SUPPORT HIM by downloading this app. WE WANT OBAMA BACK!!

attributes.title: had to go to my therapist because of this 😭
attributes.review: Do NOT get this app, it crashes wayyy to much. i wanted to download it so i can sUpport our orange god 🍊 it also makes my phone over heat so quick! 😢😢😢 By the way, i had to go to my therapist because of this app. Please do NOT get this app

attributes.title: Not a good app
attributes.review: This app is so bad like my phone was glitching so much and it was really bad so I’m going to have it short not get this app it’s not good it’s so bad that you might get a new phone after this app Bc is that bad and trust me I don’t want the same thing to you guys so not get the app

attributes.title: Terrible🤮
attributes.review: This app is so slow and glitches. And there’s a lie on it right when you open it. He says “keep America great” but ever since he got it from Obama everything has gone down! So much for keeping America great🥱. If I could rate this 0 start I would

attributes.title: This is the worst app on the entire app store
attributes.review: This app is the absolute worst thing to ever be created. honestly, it would be better off deleted off of the app store. if i could, i would rate this app 0 stars. that’s how awful it is. HIGHLY do not recommend. at all. 🤮🤮🤮

attributes.title: Horrible app!
attributes.review: First of all, there are SO MANY ADS! Also, it is Always glitching. Its so hard to use and everything is always really slow. And whenever i try using reward points, inviting friends, or joining events, NOTHING works. Its a terrible app, DO NOT GET IT! (or do and rate it one star)

attributes.title: Do not get this app!
attributes.review: This is a horrible app do not get it. It’s made my phone glitch very badly and nothing about it was good it was hard to use. I also tried to look for reasons to vote for Donald Trump I found nothing. Personally I would recommend NOT to use it.

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: This app was so crusty and dusty nasty disgusting and very immaculate never seen anything worse I will ew who would make this disgrace of an app just take the whole App Store down it’s disgusting I can’t even see people voting only 50+ be voting for this person i will never ever vote periotttttt💅
